title: Cotton in today's world
brief_description: Through scenes filmed in Egypt, India, Mexico, Indonesia and England, this film presents a brief historical background of the growing of cotton and indicates its important place in the economy of the world today. Modern American methods of growing, spraying, picking and ginning cotton are shown as well as some of the finished products.
